title: Michael Zezas: Sizing Up the Stimulus Package
description: Congressional leaders have reached a deal on a $2 trillion stimulus bill to deal with fallout from the coronavirus crisis. Will it work? Two criteria to watch for.
itunes:title: Michael Zezas: Sizing Up the Stimulus Package
